Reviews.Title: “Good business hotel, far from city center”

Reviews.Content: nice really nothing special nice view vatican easy 5 minute walk tofrom gemelli train station roma metro remember trains run every 15 minutes 14 29 rooms clean good breakfast internet bit expensive marriott gold higher member stayed wanted use marriott points going back would probably try find something downtown might expensive would offer rome small local restaurants cafes area nothing special

Reviews.Content: stayed courtyard marriott rome central park end february 2012 paid euros per night 3 nights breakfast booked website get good rate room large comfortable kingsized bed large flatscreen tv nice bathroom slept well hotel lots choice breakfast used small gym upstairs also ate restaurant one evening served good italian food thought little bit expensive drawback hotel walk 5 minutes gemelli station get train want go sightseeing rome problem hotel bus drive right vatican 3 euro fee would highly recommend hotel friends family
